inn1.comm: lovely shot to get Bangladesh underway put his right foot forward and drives through the line and in the gap to extra cover fence, what a start!
turns it around behind square leg to pick up couple of runs.
good length delivery defended with full face off the bat to mid-off.
good firm drive back down the track, Asif gets a foot to it and stops the ball.
short delivery and Tamim up on his toes and defends to cover.
good ball back of a length and Tamim defends with a straight bat to the off side.
fuller on the legs and Junaid Siddique fails to put it away.
defended to the off side.
caught! Edged and taken, good length delivery seaming away and Junaid Siddique plays forward, gets the outside edge to Akmal behind the wicket.
right behind it and defends to the onside.
caught! Another edge, this time to the first slip, good ball back of a length, Aftab plays and gets the outside edge to Misbah-ul-Haq. Second wicket of the over and Gul is bowling a perfect line.
moves forward and pushes firmly to extra cover.
good shot, drives on the up past the short cover to the deep.
nice straight drive but for no runs as it was hit too straight, hits the stumps at the non-strikers end and deflects to mid-on.
too straight from Asif, tucks it around through square leg to the deep.
on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on.
driven on the up to mid-off..
caught! Asif strikes, wide outside the off stump and Tamim who was striking the ball well, cuts in the air to Salman Butt at backward point.
tucks it off his legs through the onside for couple of runs.
good length delivery defended with a straight bat back to the bowler.
pushes on the front foot past the bowler to long on.
good ball in the corridor outside the off stump and back of a length, left alone through to Akmal.
goes off the inside of the bat to short fine leg.
a good bouncer to end the over, Ashraful sways from the line of the delivery.
good tight delivery from Asif, defended to mid-off.
short ball and Shakib-Al-Hassan mistimes the pull to the onside.
punches well to Fawad Alam at cover.
turns it around to square leg.
bit of width outside the off stump, cuts and misses, through to Akmal.
pushes in the gap to the left of mid-on for a single.
cut down to thirdman for a single.
good sharp bouncer and on target, Ashraful drops his wrist to let the ball go.
gets squared up as he defends.
good length delivery defended to mid-on.

caught! taken at first slip. Wonderful delivery back of a length and on a perfect line in the corridor outside the off stump and Ashraful moves forward and plays at it, gets the outside edge to Misbah-ul-Haq at first slip, who takes the catch low to his right.
blocked to the fielder at silly mid-on.
plays it back down the track.
short ball pulled around to deep-backward square leg.
back of a length delivery outside the off stump and Mahmudullah looking to work it through the onside can only play it back to the bowler.
wide outside the off stump and Mahmudullah lets it go through to Akmal.
good delivery outside the off stump, pitches and seams away to beat the outside edge as Mahmudullah plays forward.
another play and miss outside the off stump as the ball moves away.
short and wide outside the off stump and Shakib-Al-Hassan cuts well behind point to the fence.
appeal for a caught behind turned down as Gul bowls down the leg side, plays and misses, there was some noise there, signaled a wide.
short rising delivery angled across, goes for the hook and gets a top-edge and the ball flies down to fine leg fence.
moves in line and pushes to the off side.
works it square of the wicket on the onside and Gul chases after it to keep it to a run.
nice tight delivery, defended to the off side.
plays with an angled bat to backward point.
good ball coming in, Shakib-Al-Hasan defends to the onside.
works it square of the wicket on the onside for a single.
wide outside the off stump and Mahmudullah plays away from his body, gets beaten.
defended to the off side.
stands in the crease and defends to the off side.
plays and misses as the ball moves away outside the off stump. Mahmudullah again plays too far away from his body.
pushes back down the track.
punches off the back foot to mid-off for a quick single, shy at the stumps misses.
moves forward and plays, misses it and through to Akmal behind the wicket. The ball pitches and moves away to beat the outside edge.
oversteps, back of a length delivery outside the off stump.
swings in the air to midwicket fence. It was short of a length delivery pulled on the front foot.
fuller length delivery pushed to mid-on.
defended back to the bowler but there is not much confidence in the defensive push.
good length delivery on off and middle, pushes in the gap to the left of mid-on for a single.
off the pad and behind wicket to the onside.
plays to the onside and Asif moves across quickly to field the ball.
plays off the back foot to mid-off and takes off for a single.
defended on the front foot to cover.
cut away down to thirdman for a single.
pushes to mid-off on the front foot.
digs in a short one which goes down the leg side.
nice sharp bouncer and Mahumudullah Riad initially looking to pull, stop himself at the last moment to let it pass by.
fuller delivery and Mahmudullah works it through the onside to the deep, Yousuf chases it to the deep but the batsmen run four.
defended to the off side.
moves forward and pushes at the delivery wide outside the off stump, gets beaten as the ball moves away.
gets behind the delivery and drops it to the off side, takes off to complete the single.
short and wide outside the off stump, left alone through to Akmal.
good tight delivery outside the off stump, defended to the off side.
too wide outside the off stump.
135 kmph, nips back in to strike the pad bit high as Mahmudullah looks to play.
bowled! Of an inside edge, good length delivery coming in from outside the off stump, Mahmudullah drives on the front foot and gets an inside edge onto the stumps. Bangladesh are five down for 45.
full delivery outside the off stump, driven in the gap through cover to the deep.
times the ball well outside the off stump, a slight misfield at point gives away a run.
good shot from Shakib-Al-Hasan, fuller delivery outside the off stump driven in the gap through cover to the fence.
works it in the gap through the onside for a single.
good ball in the corridor outside the off stump, Reza watches it closely and lets it go through to Akmal.
opens the face off the bat and plays behind point to the deep.
bowls from wide off the crease, Shakib-Al-Hasan looks to punch it off the back foot, mistimes it back to the bowler.
good tight delivery on the stumps to end the over, pushed back down the track.
good tight stuff from Sohail Khan, up on his toes and defends with an angled bat to the off side.
short rising delivery just outside the off stump, was too close for the cut shot, misses it and through to Akmal.
drives and misses outside the off stump.
good short delivery, tucks up Reza as he jumps up to defend to the onside.
in the slot outside the off stump, a half-volley and Reza drives well through extra cover to the fence.
outside the off stump and Reza thinking of playing it initially, lets it go through to Akmal.
comes forward to a tossed up delivery spinning in from outside the off stump.
oversteps, defended down the track.
makes a lot of room and cuts well to cover but cannot find the gap.
moves back and defends to the onside.
quicker delivery from Afridi, plays off the back foot and gets an inside edge to short fine leg.
works it from the crease behind square leg, looking for two and they get it as Fawad Alam was bit slow onto the ball.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
a thickish edge down to thirdman as Reza drives.
short and bit of width outside the off stump, Shakib cuts on the back foot to the off side.
punches well down the ground to long off for couple of runs.
wonderful timing, short delivery and Shakib pulls it well past the short midwicket to the fence.
cut well in the gap through cover to the deep.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
moves forward and pushes to cover.
pushes to cover.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
works to the onside for a single.
good delivery, almost yorked himself as he comes down the track.
driven hard back down the track, unfortunately Reza cannot get any runs as the ball strikes the stumps at the non-strikers end.
firmly driven on the front foot to mid-off.
too wide outside the off stump, signaled a wide.
punches to mid-off.
angled into Shakib-Al-Hasan, who pushes in the gap at midwicket for a single.
good shot, short delivery and Reza pulls well in the air over midwicket to the fence, that was well picked up.
bouncer which goes over the keeper, signaled a wide.
good tight delivery on the off stump line, defended to the off side.
caught! Good length delivery outside the off stump and Reza with an open face of the bat looking to run it down, gets the outside edge to Akmal behind the wicket. Bangladesh 6 down for 82.
oversteps, pushed back to the bowler.
chips it in the air to the onside for a single.
gets good drift, was a quicker delivery and Dhiman Ghosh is hurried into the shot to the onside.
plays it back to the bowler.
off the pad the ball goes into the hands of first slip, a stifled appeal turned down.
plumb! Quicker delivery from Afirdi pitches outside the off stump and spins to strike the pad as Dhiman Ghosh plays forward, loud appeal and umpire Haider acknowledges.
good ball spins across the batsman as he plays, gets beaten.
fuller delivery driven firmly to mid-on.
good shot by Shakib-Al-Hasan but Afirdi is quick to cut off the ball at extra cover.
neatly turned around to fine leg for a single.
low full toss squeezed out to second slip.
plays and misses outside the off stump, coming in from wide outside the off stump.
defended to the onside on the front foot.
wide outside the off stump, cut to the sweeper cover for a single.
a good shout for lbw turned down, that strikes the pad in line with the off stump as the ball spins in.
opens the face off the bat and plays to short thirdman for a single.
cuts behind point to Yousuf.
tosses it bit full outside the off stump, driven to deep-mid off.
plays it back to the bowler on the back foot.
full delivery outside the off stump, driven to the sweeper cover.
short delivery outside the off stump, blocked to the off side.
good ball coming in, defended to mid-on.
short outside the off stump, Razzak cuts and misses.
digs in a short one, Razzak lets it go through to Akmal.
drives and misses outside the off stump and through to Akmal.
moves forward and pushes in the gap to cover for a single.
defended to the fielder. at silly-point
tosses it up and Razzak goes for the big shot and miscues it high in the air to long on.
pushes to the off side for a quick single.
moves back and plays to cover.
quicker delivery driven to mid-off.
punches off the back foot to mid-off.
punches off the back foot back to the bowler.
short ball and Shakib mistimes the pull to the onside.
strikes the thigh pad, was too late to play to the onside.
short delivery angled across, left alone through to Akmal.
right in the block-hole, dug out to the off side.
pushes to the off side.
paddles it square of the wicket on the onside.
goes for a big heave on the onside and misses it, Akmal appeals for a stumping, referred to the third umpire. Green light flashes.
pushes it down the track.
plays it to the onside, it was the off-break from Afridi.
cuts and misses outside the off stump.
punches off the back foot to Afridi at extra cover.
fuller delivery pushed wide of mid-on for a single.
good sharp bouncer from Gul, Razzak ducks under it.
defends with an angled bat to cover-point.
outside edge down to thirdman for a single.
oversteps, wide outside the off stump, cut down wide of thirdman for couple of runs.
another noball, another Free hit. Fuller delivery punched to mid-off. Brings up the 50 for Shakib, well played.
short ball played in the air past the bowler to mid-off.
pushes to mid-on for a single.
defended on the front foot to backward point.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
turns it around to square leg and picks up couple of runs.
punches off the back foot to the off side.
driven down the ground to long off.
driven down the ground to long off.

lbw! Shoaib Malik strikes, tosses it up on the off stump line and strikes the back pad as Razzak misses the line of the delivery, loud appeal and Bucknor takes his time, nods his head and then lifts his finger.
works square of the wicket on the onside.
moves forward and pushes square of the wicket on the off side.
driven to extra cover.
driven back down the track.
driven back to the bowler.
punches down the ground to long off.
driven back down the track.
down the leg side, nudged down to fine leg.
turns it around to long leg for a single.
moves forward and drives to extra cover.
pushes in the gap to cover-point for a single.
nice shot, hit on the up to the sweeper cover for a single.
good ball right in the block-hole, dug out to the off side.
plays with an angled bat to backward point.
defended to the off side.
fuller delivery driven to mid-off.
driven past the bowler and down the ground to long on.
leaves a ball that spins in, was a close thing.
moves back and punches through the off side to deep-extra cover for couple of runs.
moves forward and defends down the track.
that is nicely played by Mortaza, it was on the pads and he works it fine to the fence.
moves forward and defends square of the wicket on the off side.
cracking shot, short ball and Shakib pulls well through midwicket to the fence, that was wonderfully struck.
pitched up delivery, hit hard onto the pitch and the ball bounces over the bowler to mid-off.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to thirdman. Plays it away from his body.
wonderful shot, driven on the up in the gap between extra cover and mid-off, nobody moves and the ball races to the fence.
punches to mid-off.
inside edges square of the wicket on the onside, coming back for the second run as Gul goes after the ball.
works it square of the wicket on the onside for a single.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
a bit of inside edge as Mortaza plays forward.
slower turn from Afridi, cuts and misses outside the off stump.
short ball pulled away to deep-midwicket.
googly from Afridi and Shakib looks to drive on the front foot, gets beaten.
moves forward and pushes to cover.
works it behind square leg for a single.
driven down the ground to long off.
defended to the off side.
played square of the wicket on the off side.
mistimes the shot back to the bowler.
too wide outside the off stump.
driven down the ground to long off.
driven with the full face off the bat down the ground to long off.
moves forward and drives along the ground to Afridi at extra cover.
moves forward and works to the onside, Fawad Alam quickly onto the ball.
nicely struck, driven well to deep-extra cover.
smashed away on the front foot to deep-point.
turns it around square of the wicket on the onside.
pushes to the onside.
gets a leading edge on the track.
defended to the off side.
fires it down the leg side, off the pad past the keeper to the deep.
punches to the onside and Malik does well to move across quickly.
driven down the ground to long off.
defended to the off side.
low full toss, driven past the diving bowler to long off
plays it behind square leg, coming back for the second run, the throw comes in and Shakib dives into the crease, Akmal breaks the stumps, referred to the third umpire, green light flashes.
played to the onside.
opens the face off the bat and plays to short thirdman for a single.
swept to long leg for a single.
punches down the ground to long off.
defended to the off side.
works it behind square leg for a single.
pushes to the onside.
defended square of the wicket on the off side.
plays it square of the wicket on the onside for a single.
driven down the ground to long on.
dropped! Tosses it up wide outside the off stump, goes for the drive and gets the outside edge, Yousuf is too slow to come to take the catch, not judging the pace.
played to the off side.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
down the wicket and plays inside-out over extra cover to the deep.
down the wicket and pushes behind the wicket on the off side.
sweeps to deep-midwicket for a single.
drives and misses outside the off stump.
a cheeky shot as Mortaza gets it over the keeper.
driven down the ground to long on.
good slog sweep, does well to midwicket fence.
driven down the ground to long off.
a leading edge to the off side.
width outside the off stump and goes in the air, bisects the backward-point and short thirdman to the deep.
driven down the ground to long off.
pushes down the ground to long on.
plays square of the wicket on the off side.
forces to the off side.
plays it through the vacant midwicket.
that is hit hard to the sweeper cover.
sweeps and misses.
edges as he looks to work it through the leg side.
punched down the ground to long off.
punched off the back foot to mid-off.
short ball pulled around behind square leg to the deep for couple of runs.
punches hard to extra cover, Misbah does well, fields the ball and quickly puts in a throw as the batsman comes back in.
punches down the ground to long off.
slower delivery which goes wrong for Asif, down the leg side.
short of a length delivery closer to the batsman, pushes at it and misses.
good shot from Shakib, sweeps well along the ground to midwicket fence, wonderful batting.
moves forward and pushes to extra cover, takes off for a tight single.
blocked on the track.
defended to the off side.
off the pad they scamper through for a leg bye.
down the leg side, signaled a wide.
works it square of the wicket on the onside.
short ball chopped into the ground through the off side.
driven hard to extra cover, cannot find the gap.
slower delivery pushed back down the track.
cuts and misses outside the off stump, there was width there to put it away.
punches it off the back foot to cover, moves onto 99.
pushes to the off side.

that's it Shakib gets his second ODI hundred, plays it to deep-extra cover to pick up couple of runs, well played. Raises his bat to the crowd, the dressing room stand up to applaud him, gets a hug from Mortaza.
plays it wide of the bowler to mid-off for a single.
off the pad to the onside.
down the wicket and drives it well straight past the stumps to long off, Sohail Khan makes a mess of it as he throws it to Gul who was along side him, they get an extra run.
driven to mid-on for a single.
slower delivery outside the off stump, plays and misses.
down the leg side, signaled a wide.
caught! Good slower delivery from Asif, Mortaza looking to go over the fence, mishits it high in the air down the ground to long off, Fawad Alam judges it well to take the catch.
driven to the sweeper cover for couple of runs.
slower full toss, mistimes to midwicket for a single.
moves back and plays square of the wicket on the off side.
reversing in, a full toss driven down the ground to long on.
works to the onside.
a slight misunderstanding as Shahadat Hossain pushes to the onside.
defended on the front foot to the off side.
played to the off side.
driven back to the bowler.
works to the onside.
caught! Short delivery and Shakib pulls from wide outside the off stump and mishits the shot high in the air to mid-on, where Fawad Alam takes the catch.

inn2.comm: tucked away to the fielder at square leg.
pushed to cover on the front foot.
left alone through to Dhiman Ghosh.
worked through midwicket for a single.
down the leg side, off the pad and behind the wicket.
pushes to the onside for a single.
drives on the front foot to mid-off, a mistimed shot.
mistimes once again to mid-off.
down the leg side and Butt tickles it down to fine leg fence for the first boundary of the innings.
good shot but well fielded by Shakib, who went to his right to field the ball.
moves forward and pushes to the left of backward point for a single.
stands up and works to the onside.
good shot, Akmal drives on the up through the off side to cover fence.
loud appeal for lbw turned down as it strikes the pad, was too high and going down the leg side.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to thirdman for a single.
pitched up delivery driven back to the bowler.
pushes to the onside.
outside edge down to thirdman for a single.
poor delivery down the leg side and Butt nudges it fine to the fence.
fuller delivery driven firmly to mid-on, a fumble there by Razzak.
moves forward to a good length delivery and defends to the off side.
punches square of the wicket on the off side.
cut away hard to Aftab at point, shy at the stumps at the non-strikers end uproots the middle stump, the batsman was safe in the crease.
down the leg side.
cuts and gets an under-edge, could have easily dragged onto the stumps.
punches to short cover.
good length delivery defended with the full face off the bat to mid-off.
back of a length delivery, worked to square leg.
works to the onside.
good shot, works it off his legs through square leg to the deep, Mahmudullah chases it to the ropes and pulls it in.
punches off the back foot back to the bowler.
pushes to mid-on.
full and down the leg side.
short and wide outside the off stump, left alone through to Dhiman Ghosh.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
dropped! fuller and wide outside the off stump, driven in the air to extra cover, goes through Mahmudullah Riad's hand to the deep.
flicks it off his legs to deep-backward square leg.
works it behind square leg to the deep for couple of runs.
hit hard to fielder at point, unable to find the gap is Akmal.
punches it down to mid-on.
punches to cover-point, Aftab moves across quickly and does well to field it.
moves forward and opens the face off the bat to backward point.
lovely shot, driven off the back foot past backward point to the fence, wonderful timing.
moves forward and defends well with a straight bat to the off side.
full and wide outside the off stump, mistimes the shot back to the bowler.
played in the gap wide of mid-off and the ball races along the grassy turf to the fence.
beautiful shot, puts his right foot forward and drives well through mid-off as Ashraful dives over the ball, the goes to the fence.
works it to square leg, shy at the stumps misses.
good shot, finds the gap through cover to the deep as Mahumudullah and Ashraful chases off after the ball.
fuller and on the legs, flicked away behind square leg to the fence.
driven in the gap through point to the fence, flowing shots from Butt.
works it through the onside to the deep, lovely timing and good wrist work.
driven firmly back down the track and Mortaza gets some hand on it as it goes to mid-on.
short and wide outside the off stump, Akmal cuts it hard over backward point to the fence.
this is wonderful batting, moves forward and drives through cover-point to the fence.
driven back to the bowler.
punches hard to cover.
moves forward and defends down the track.
punches to mid-on.
turns it around to deep-square leg for couple of runs.
cuts it past backward point to the deep, Aftab quickly chases after the ball and pulls it in.
tucked away through square leg for a single.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
defends on the front foot to the onside.
drives it down the ground to long on.
moves forward and plays square of the wicket on the off side.
works it behind square leg for a single.
spins in and Butt works to the onside.
lovely cut shot, plays it past point to the deep, comes back for the second run.
cut hard along the ground to the sweeper cover for a single.
tucked away through square leg to the deep, good running fetches couple of runs.
moves forward and drives back down the track.
moves back and cuts to short thirdman.
moves back and punches down the ground to long on.
moves forward and defends to cover.
works it to square leg.
moves forward and works to the onside.
tosses it up and Butt drives down the track, good stop by Shakib-Al-Hasan.
driven to mid-on and that brings up the 50 for Butt of 52 balls.
lovely strike, Akmal steps down the track and launches it over long on fence for maximum.
punches to mid-off on the front foot.
cuts and the ball goes on the bounce to Mortaza at short thirdman.
turned away to the onside.
works to the onside.
defends on the front foot back to the bowler.
works it through midwicket to the deep.
Butt down the wicket and pushes to mid-on, Ashraful does well to cut it off as he moves from extra cover.
driven down the ground to long on.
tossed it wide outside the off stump, cuts and misses.
swings it in the air  to the midwicket fence.
defended to the off side.
loud appeal for lbw as the ball strikes the pad, must have struck him outside the line.
pushes it to the onside.
driven down the ground to long on.
appeal for lbw turned as he was a long way forward.
was looking to go for the big shot on the onside, adjusts well to defend to the off side.
pushes to extra cover on the front foot.
moves forward and pushes along the ground to extra cover.
wonderful shot, cut nicely along the ground to the cover-point boundary.
turns it around behind square leg to the deep.
caught! Down the wicket and Akmal looking to go over the fence, mishits it high in the air down to long off, where Mortaza settles under it to take a good catch.
driven to mid-on.
defended on the front foot.
defended to the off side.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long on.
inside edge behind square leg for a single.
driven down the ground to long on.
cuts well to the sweeper cover for a single.
moves forward and defends to cover.
works it midwicket.
defended square of the wicket on the off side.
pushes along the ground to extra cover.
moves forward and plays square of the wicket on the off side.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
defended on the front foot to the off side.
works straight to the fielder at midwicket.
drives to the onside.
wide outside the off stump, cuts and misses.
way down the leg side.
strikes the pad, appeal turned down as the ball was drifting down the leg side.
works it straight to the fielder at midwicket.
pushes to the off side.
pushes to mid-on.
sweeps it behind square leg, Aftab Ahmed lets it go under him to the deep.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
once again defended to the off side.
inside edges to square leg.
moves forward and defends behind the wicket on the off side.
defends on the front foot to the onside.
tosses it full outside the off stump and Butt hits it in the air over extra cover to the fence.
down the leg side and Butt sweeps to long leg.
defended to the off side on the front foot.
plays down the track.
defended to the onside.
pushes to mid-on.
plays to the onside.
wonderful timing and perfectly placed, sweeps well through square leg to the fence.
punches to the onside.
driven to mid-on to Ashraful.
sweeps well once again behind square leg to the deep.
pushes to the off side for a quick single.
cuts and chops it on the ground.
punches to mid-on.
pushes it back to the bowler.
run out! Pushes to cover and takes off for a non-existent single, Razzak picks up and scores a direct hit at the bowlers end, Butt is a long way off.
pushes wide of mid-on for a single.
pushes to mid-on for a quick single.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
works to the onside.
moves forward and defends to cover.
works it square of the wicket on the onside for a tight single, Razzak once again scores a direct hit at the bowlers end, referred to the third umpire and the green light flashes.
moves forward and pushes it back to the bowler.
plays through cover for a single.
pushes to the onside and Mahmudullah moves across to field the ball.
works it in the gap through the onside to the deep for a single.
sweeps well down to fine leg, Mortaza fumbles to give away the second run.
moves forward and pushes down the track.
reverse sweeps and misses, loud appeal for lbw turned down as the ball strikes Yousuf on the body outside the line.
off the pad to short fine leg.
good ball on target, pushes to mid-on.
wide outside the off stump, pitches and moves away, Yousuf plays and misses.
short down the leg side, Yousuf goes for a pull shot and misses, Dhiman Ghosh appeal for a catch turned down and signaled a wide.
cut through point to the deep for a single.
low full toss played back to the bowler.
pushes to the off side.
digs in a short one, which goes harmlessly past the batsman.
down the leg side, not signaled a wide.
driven down the ground to long on.
punches it through the onside to long on.
pushes to the onside to midwicket.
driven down the ground to long on.
pushes to the onside, Reza does well moving in from midwicket.
flicks it through square leg.
full delivery driven to mid-on.
punches to mid-on.
cut hard through point to the deep, misfield by Shakib at point.
digs in a short one, which goes harmlessly through to the keeper.
punches it wide of mid-on to the deep, Ashraful chases after it and pulls it in.
pushes it down the track.
punches to mid-off.
no timing in the shot, cuts to cover.
off the pad to the onside.
pushes to the off side.
works it square of the wicket on the onside.
plays behind point and Mahmudullah makes a good diving save.
pushes in the gap through cover to the deep.
drives wide of mid-off, Raqibul the substitute does well moving across quickly.
digs in a short one and through to Dhiman Ghosh.
pushes past the bowler to mid-on for a quick single, shy at the stumps from Ashraful misses.
works it through the onside to the deep, the fielder is bit late on the ball and they complete the second run. Bazid Khan just running into the bowler.
sweeps and misses, off the forearm the ball lobs up to the onside and the keeper takes it and appeals for a catch turned down.
down the wicket and works it through midwicket to the deep.
drops it touch short and Yousuf works to short fine leg for a single.
mistimes the pull shot to the onside.
almost chipped into the hands of midwicket.
driven down the ground to long on.
short delivery outside the off stump and Bazid Khan drives and misses.
punches it back down the track, Reza fields the ball and throws it back, bit of aggression.
pushes to mid-off.
a bouncer which goes way over the batsman, signaled a wide.
driven square of the wicket on the off side.
pushes to mid-on for a single.
pushes through midwicket for a single.
plays to the onside.
moves across his stumps and drives down the ground to long on.
moves back and punches straight to the fielder at extra cover.
at last Bazid Khan gets out of his shell and clobbers it high and over the midwicket fence for maximum.
driven down the ground to long on.
sweeps to short fine leg for a single.
moves forward and leans into the shot, drives through point to the deep.
pushes straight to the fielder at extra cover.
punches on the front foot to extra cover.
driven back down the track.
driven through the off side to deep cover for a single.
strikes the pad, was going down the leg side.
works it through the onside to the deep.
driven down the ground to long on.
works it to midwicket for a single.
floats it wide and Yousuf was down the track, plays to mid-off.
a leading edge to the off side as he looks to play to the onside.
swings it high in the air to deep-midwicket, good work by Aftab in the deep.
plays it down to thirdman for a single.
punches to the onside, a slight fumble allows the single.
cuts it down to thirdman for a single.
pushes down the track to mid-on for a single.
cuts it down to thirdman for a single.
pushes to mid-off for a single.
driven to mid-on for a single.
driven back to the bowler.
steps down the wicket and chips it in the air down the ground to long on.
pushes it back to the bowler.
works it to square leg.
off the pad to the onside as Bazid looks to work it.
plays to midwicket.
driven firmly on the front foot to extra cover.
good shot, plays with an angled bat through point to the deep for couple of runs.
strikes the pad, was going down the leg side.
pushes to extra cover.
chips it in the air just over mid-on to the deep.
down the wicket and drives to long on.
worked straight to the fielder at midwicket.
pushes to mid-off.
good shot, bisects the gap between backward point and short thirdman.
driven down the ground to long on.
driven down the ground to long on.
pushes to cover for a single.
punches to the onside.
good shot from Bazid Khan, connects it well and hits it over midwicket to the fence.
full delivery dug out to the onside.
driven firmly down the track and past the bowler down the ground to long off.
attempted yorker played down the ground to long off.
works to the fielder at midwicket.
down the leg side.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
cuts late in the gap between short thirdman and backward point to the deep.
pushes to midwicket to the fielder.
plays it to square leg.
moves forward and defends square of the wicket.
driven to mid-off.
cuts and gets an outside edge down to thirdman fence, brings up his 50.
off the pad to the onside.
caught! Tossed up delivery outside the off stump, mistimes the drive in the air to mid-off, where Shahadat Hossain takes the catch.
moves back and plays to backward point.
punches to mid-on.
cuts to point.
good shot off the back foot, works it nicely in the gap through midwicket to the fence.
sweeps and off the pad to the onside.
comes forward and defends to the onside.
moves forward and pushes to point.
cuts hard square of the wicket on the off side to the fence, well timed shot.
plays softly to the off side for a single.
sweeps down past the keeper to the fence.
